# NSView.ToolTipTag

**Type Alias**

This type describes the rectangle used to identify a tooltip rectangle.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ToolTipTag = Int
```

## Discussion

If the value of this type is 0, it is invalid. See the methods [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/addToolTip(_:owner:userData:)] and[doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSView/removeToolTip(_:)].

## Providing a Tool Tip

- **toolTip**: The text for the view’s tooltip.
- **addToolTip(_:owner:userData:)**: Creates a tooltip for a defined area in the view and returns a tag that identifies the tooltip rectangle.
- **removeAllToolTips()**: Removes all tooltips assigned to the view.
- **removeToolTip(_:)**: Removes the tooltip identified by specified tag.
